channel.title: Has this been done? Is it possible? Player owned shops
channel.description: I was thinking of Player owned shops. Like you would type ::myshop and then a blank shop would open up, and then you could place your items into that shop, and the close it and it would save. Then, another player could type ::shop playername ( a player's name ) And it would open up that shop. They could buy stuff from taht shop, and the other player would get the money put into there bank. I have a good idea on how to do this ( Im not inexpereicned, i do know alot of stuff ) But i have a couple questions. 1. Has this been done before? 2. If not, is it possible? 3. Would it be client side as well Thanks

item.title: Has this been done? Is it possible? Player owned shops
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

[quote=“Alex Pkz, post:5, topic:201175”]I’m not sure if it would be client sided,
but this has been done b4 just not on rs or anything many other games use player-owned shops which is where you got this idea from
LEECHED haha jk idc[/quote]
I got the idea from the RS Grand exchange lol. Well ill try to do it, it should be realitivily easy. Couple weeks at most.

Read full topic
item.source: Has this been done? Is it possible? Player owned shops
